row.text: Decano Cicestriensi (al. Cassiensi) scribit de controversia W. et E. cle- ricorum. App. conc. Lat. VIII. 14, Coll. Lips. XLIII. 14, Coll. Cass. XLVIII. 11, Coll. Bamb. XXXIX. 11, Comp. I. L. 2. t. 16. c. 11, Decr. Greg. L. II. t. 23. c. 10. — „Litteras Exoniensis“ („Qui veri similitudinem“ Quia verisimile“).
